title: Trap Character
body:
Trap Character

Three days passed by in a blink of an eye.

During these three days, Evan did nothing but relax. He visited all the famous spots of the city to enjoy his fake vacation.

After these three days, Evan was definitely feeling better than before.

It was his first vacation after coming to Arora World. In the past two years, he did not get any chance to enjoy himself.

'Tomorrow is the day of the mission' Evan thought while looking at the beautiful night sky.

Currently, Evan was sitting in a large boat that looks similar to a gondola, and was enjoying the night view.

The sound of flowing water together with the starry sky was quite relaxing.

He had a cold drink in his hand and he was slowly drinking it while enjoying his ride.

The gondola was quite big, and there were other people as well on the gondola, but Evan was sitting at the end of it so he wasn't bothered by it.
